content: I think I'll use a digital thermometer to track my temperature and log it in the Sympto app. It seems like a convenient way to track my temperature and other symptoms in one place. By the way, I've been experiencing some fatigue and muscle weakness lately, which I mentioned to my doctor. We're considering the possibility of a vitamin deficiency, and I'll be getting tested for it soon. Do you think it's a good idea to track my energy levels and muscle strength as well?
